text: Bron is a commune. It is in the Metropolis of Lyon in Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes in east France. About 42,200 people live there. == Geography == Bron is east of Lyon and is the sixth-largest suburb of the city of Lyon. == Sights == The Fort de Bron, built between 1872 and 1876, is part of the second belt of fortifications around Lyon. == Twin towns == Bron is twinned with: * Cumbernauld, Scotland, United Kingdom * Grimma, Germany * Weingarten, Germany * Talavera de la Reina, Spain == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Communes in Rhône
